The "knight" is a blowback-operated submachine gun designed for the Vityaz, an elite anti-terrorist unit. It is a variant of the PP-19 Bizon based on and sharing many commonalities with the AK-74, though while directly developed from the Bizon, the Vityaz features a more conventional appearance. Today, it is used by patrol groups, Russian traffic police, Russian security police and by units of the MVD.
